definition: hand/(formal) to hold/person engaged in certain types of work/person skilled in certain types of work/personal(ly)/convenient/classifier for skill/CL:雙|双[shuang1],隻|只[zhi1]
lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc

sentences.english: The torchlight swung across the little beach and out over the water, searching.
sentences.chinese: 手电筒的光在小海滩上扫过，而后照向水面搜索着。

sentences.english: Most flashlights work on two batteries.
sentences.chinese: 大多数的手电筒用两节电池。

sentences.english: He flashed his light under and over sofas and beds until he came to the biggest bed of all.
sentences.chinese: 他举起手电筒照了沙发上下和床，直到最大的那张床。

sentences.english: It was I that (who) bought a second-hand computer yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 我昨天买了一台二手电脑。

sentences.english: Suddenly somehody flashed an electric torch.
Hand her a flashlight so she can see the way.
sentences.chinese: 给她一把手电筒让她看清道路。

sentences.english: No waking me up when you come in at night using your BlackBerry as a flashlight.
sentences.chinese: 别半夜进屋把黑莓手机当手电筒使把我弄醒。

sentences.english: My computer is second-hand and the seller didn't give me anything else.
sentences.chinese: 我买的是二手电脑，卖主没给我别的东西。

sentences.english: Flashlights shot streaks of gleam up and down at the walls.
sentences.chinese: 手电筒射出一道道光束，在墙上晃动。

sentences.english: In the light from my torch nothing had any color.
sentences.chinese: 在手电筒的光线的照射下，所有东西都没了声色。

sentences.english: To save energy I kept the flashlight off.
sentences.chinese: 为了省电我关了手电筒。

sentences.english: The doctor is examining his pupil with a torch.
sentences.chinese: 医生打着手电筒检查他的瞳仁。

sentences.english: She cherishes a hope that she will be a singer some day.
sentences.chinese: 他们怀着希望将手电筒一开一关地打信号。

sentences.english: U. S. Marines play a game of "Risk" by flashlight in Afghanistan.
sentences.chinese: 美海军陆战队在手电筒下玩着一款冒险游戏，阿富汗。

sentences.english: Must I use SureFire batteries in my flashlight?
sentences.chinese: 我必须在我的电池使用神火手电筒？

sentences.english: He'll need a tent and a flashlight.
sentences.chinese: 他需要一顶帐棚和一个手电筒。

definition: electric light socket/burner (component of a kerosene lamp)/light (as a countable item, e.g. number of lights fitted in a house)

pinyin: shen1 shou3 bu4 jian4 wu3 zhi3
